name: react-native-share
description: Social share, sending simple data to other apps.

scripts.dev-sync: echo 'This is not needed anymore, the example is always synced'; exit 1
scripts.release:major: node ./changelog --major && npm version major && git push origin && git push origin --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: node ./changelog --minor && npm version minor && git push origin && git push origin --follow-tags
scripts.release:patch: node ./changelog --patch && npm version patch && git push origin && git push origin --follow-tags
scripts.release:version: node ./changelog --version $VERSION && git push origin && git push origin --follow-tags
scripts.validate: yarn validate:prettier && yarn validate:lint && yarn validate:flow
